Your settlement statement is provided in PDF format and may consist of multiple pages. The first page has an overall summary of your statement and is divided into five main sections. ## 1. Summary The statement summary is the very first part of your exported PDF file. This part will show you useful information about your statement, most importantly the remittance period. In the example below, the statement is generated for all transactions that took place between the 10th and the 13th of November 2016.  
Upload an image...
settlement-statements-statement-summary.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

## 2. Statement summary The statement summary section provides an overall highlight of the sales that took place for each currency processed by your account. It will also include some brief information about the total deductions that took place before reaching the final amount. 
Upload an image...
settlement-statement-statement-summary-section.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

## 3. Currency conversion summary This section highlights the settlement currency into which each processing currency will be settled into. It also indicates the FX rate that applied in the conversion process and any other fee that is applied before transferring the amount. 
Upload an image...
settlement-statements-currency-conversion-summary.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

## 4. Remittance information The final amount that will be transferred to your bank account will be highlighted in this section in addition to showing the bank account information to which the amount will be wired. The Wire ID field can sometimes state ”Funds carried forward”, which means that the amount will not be transferred to your back account for not meeting the threshold setup on the account. To revise this threshold, please contact your relationship manager. 
Upload an image...
settlement-statements-remittance-information.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

## 5. Reserve account balance This section highlights how much is held in rolling reserve during the statement period, how much is released from the reserve, and the total balances as at the end date of the statement. 
Upload an image...
settlement-statements-reserve-account-balance.png
